name: The Great Jelly Escape
description:
King Jelly has been captured! Use his Jelly companions to help him get out safely.

A small game made for the GDevelop Game Jam #2.

Also playable on mobile!

Liluo link: https://liluo.io/atomicpotato/the-great-jelly-escape

How the game was made:

  • Logic, scripting and rendering were done in GDevelop (Duh!).
  • Game assets were made in Affinity Designer.
  • Character animations were made in OpenToonz.
  • Music was made in BeepBox.
  • Sound effects were made using a microphone and Windows Sound Recorder.
  • Sound editing was done in Kdenlive and GDevelop for pitch manipulation.
